author: mtosi
body:
as requested by the TSG,
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ilqSm8_6ImzK3RR3bxLemjri-4yXQAt9bWKvo-BYd2U/edit#heading=h.948g1p3wtuig

among different ESModules used @HLT,
I found there were few cfi files missing

please, find below the list of modules I checked @gennai @fwyzard 

PropagatorWithMaterialESProducer           --> TrackingTools/MaterialEffects/python/MaterialPropagator_cfi.py
ParametrizedMagneticFieldProducer          --> MagneticField/ParametrizedEngine/python/ParabolicParametrizedField_cfi.py
Chi2MeasurementEstimatorESProducer         --> TrackingTools/KalmanUpdators/python/Chi2MeasurementEstimatorESProducer_cfi.py
Chi2ChargeMeasurementEstimatorESProducer   --> RecoTracker/MeasurementDet/python/Chi2ChargeMeasurementEstimatorESProducer_cfi.py
AnalyticalPropagatorESProducer             --> TrackingTools/Producers/python/analyticalPropagatorESProducer_cfi.py NEW
ClusterShapeHitFilterESProducer            --> RecoPixelVertexing/PixelLowPtUtilities/python/ClusterShapeHitFilterESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripGainESProducer                      --> CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/SiStripGainESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripQualityESProducer                   --> CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/SiStripQualityESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripRecHitMatcherESProducer             --> RecoLocalTracker/SiStripRecHitConverter/python/SiStripRecHitMatcher_cfi.py
SteppingHelixPropagatorESProducer          --> TrackPropagation/SteppingHelixPropagator/python/SteppingHelixPropagator_cfi.py
TrackerDigiGeometryESModule                --> Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder/python/trackerDigiGeometryESModule_cfi.py
TrackerGeometricDetESModule                --> Geometry/TrackerNumberingBuilder/test/tracker_cfg.py
TransientTrackBuilderESProducer            --> TrackingTools/TransientTrack/python/TransientTrackBuilder_cfi.py
NavigationSchoolESProducer                 --> RecoTracker/TkNavigation/python/NavigationSchoolESProducer_cfi.py
KFFittingSmootherESProducer                --> TrackingTools/TrackFitters/python/KFFittingSmootherESProducer_cfi.py
GlobalTrackingGeometryESProducer           --> Geometry/GlobalTrackingGeometryBuilder/python/globalTrackingGeometryESProducer_cfi.py NEW
KFTrajectoryFitterESProducer               --> TrackingTools/TrackFitters/python/KFTrajectoryFitterESProducer_cfi.py
KFUpdatorESProducer                        --> TrackingTools/KalmanUpdators/python/KFUpdatorESProducer_cfi.py
MeasurementTrackerESProducer               --> RecoTracker/MeasurementDet/python/MeasurementTrackerESProducer_cfi.py
PixelCPEGenericESProducer                  --> RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits/python/PixelCPEGeneric_cfi.py
StripCPEESProducer                         --> RecoLocalTracker/SiStripRecHitConverter/python/StripCPEESProducer_cfi.py
TkTransientTrackingRecHitBuilderESProducer --> RecoTracker/TransientTrackingRecHit/python/TransientTrackingRecHitBuilder_cfi.py
TrackerRecoGeometryESProducer              --> RecoTracker/GeometryESProducer/python/TrackerRecoGeometryESProducer_cfi.py
TrajectoryCleanerESProducer                --> TrackingTools/Producers/python/trajectoryCleanerESProducer_cfi.py NEW
SiPixelQualityESProducer                   --> CalibTracker/SiPixelESProducers/python/SiPixelQualityESProducer_cfi.py
SiPixelTemplateDBObjectESProducer          --> CalibTracker/SiPixelESProducers/python/SiPixelTemplateDBObjectESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionDepESProducer    --> CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionDepESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripLorentzAngleDepESProducer           --> CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/SiStripLorentzAngleDepESProducer_cfi.py
SiStripConnectivity                        --> CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/SiStripConnectivity_cfi.py
title: add ESModule template
